title: Their Lonely Betters - poem as a whole suggests

content.prompt: The poem as a whole is best interpreted as suggesting that

choices.label: animals live richer lives than humans do because they do not fear death
loneliness is the inherent condition of all living things
only humans have the burden of consciousness
most humans long to be less alienated from nature

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
